Package org.concordia.macs.Utilities

Class PlayersGameplay

java.lang.Object
org.concordia.macs.Utilities.PlayersGameplay
public class PlayersGameplay extends Object
The PlayersGameplay class manages gameplay related to players.

      Assigns countries to players randomly.
      Parameters:
      p_playersList - The list of players.
      p_countryList - The list of countries.
      p_continentList - The list of continents.
      Returns:

      public static ArrayList<String> showPlayersCountry(Player player, int displayFlag)
      Displays countries owned by a player.
      Parameters:

      displayFlag - Flag indicating whether to display the countries.
      Returns:

    • checkArmyAvailable

      public static boolean checkArmyAvailable(int army, Player player)
      Checks if a player has enough armies available.
      Parameters:
      army - The number of armies to check for.
      player - The player to check.
      Returns:
      True if the player has enough armies, false otherwise.
